question: Describe case studies and interviews focused on Environmental Science.
sql_query1:
SELECT Case_Studies.description
FROM Case_Studies
WHERE Case_Studies.Topic = "Environmental Science"
UNION
SELECT Interviews.description
FROM Interviews
WHERE Interviews.Topic = "Environmental Science"
sql_query2:
SELECT Case_Studies.description
FROM Case_Studies
UNION
SELECT Interviews.description
FROM Interviews
WHERE Interviews.Topic = "Environmental Science"
interpretation1: Can you show the descriptions of both case studies discussing Environmental science and interviews discussing the same topic?
interpretation2: Describe all case studies and also describe interviews focused on Environmental science.
